name: Blood Moon Harvest
description:
You are a simple farmer that lives far away from people. This world is strange and dangerous but you can rely on your radio to tell you safety protocols that might safe you from the Scare Crow and madness.

---Controls---

ASDW - Movement

E - Interact

ESC - Toggles Fullscreen on/off

---Extra---

This game was originally meant to be a participant of Ludum Dare 52 game jam but since it was my first time making a 3d game I underestimated the time it would take and wasn't able to finish it before the jam ended. Despite that I decided to finish the game and add features that I originally had planned to cut.
